body.name: OMAIGA Steam Iron for Clothes, 1500W Clothes Iron with 3-Way Auto-Off, Durable Ceramic Soleplate, Iron for Clothes with 11.8oz Water Tank, Steam Iron with Self-Cleaning, Anti-calc Function
deliveryMessages: Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 57 mins
features: 【CERAMIC COATED SOLEPLATE】This OMAIGA steam iron is equipped with a ceramic coated soleplate, which heats up quickly and evenly, gliding easily across various garments. It's super scratch-resistant, more durable, and easier to clean. The tapered tip easily navigates hard-to-reach corners, delivering a smoother and more accurate glide over all types of fabrics for 30% faster ironing.

【RAPID AND EFFICIENT】The OMAIGA 1500W clothing iron offers superior wrinkle removal, easily tackling the most stubborn creases. It provides 20g/min of continuous steam, effectively removing stubborn creases from all kinds of fabrics. With up to 0.8g/shot of steam burst, it softens the wrinkles in your clothes. Ideal for sewers, quilters, crafters, and everyday home ironing care.

【LARGE CAPACITY WATER TANK】The 11.84oz (350ml) large capacity water tank allows you to iron a full basket of clothes with just one fill. It features a self-clean function and an anti-calc function to remove limescale, maintaining the iron's performance.

【EASY-CONTROL THERMOSTAT KNOB】Combining parallel and vertical steam, dry iron, and steam ironing, the OMAIGA clothes iron has a scientific steam hole distribution for even steam, more effectively removing wrinkles. Equipped with three temperature settings, it provides the optimal temperature for various types of clothing, easing ironing concerns.

【NOT A USED IRON】Each portable iron undergoes a functional test before hitting the market to prevent product quality issues from inconveniencing customers. Therefore, it is NORMAL to see some water residue in its tank. If you have any questions about this iron, please feel free to contact us. We offer a one-year warranty.

【SAFETY & CONVENIENCE】Designed with a 3-way auto shut-off, this powerful steam iron automatically powers off within 30 seconds if placed horizontally or tipped over, and within 8 minutes if left vertically without movement. For extra safety, if the iron's temperature is too low to generate steam, the auto-shut-off system will stop the water supply, preventing any drips from the soleplate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease of use.
reviews.reviewText: This steamer/iron, is fantastic. Wish I had ordered one sooner. So easy to use and works great. Follow instructions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used this for the first time yesterday and it worked great!! No sputtering, fast heating, lightweight, was able to do 2 full/long scarves and 4 long-sleeved shirts on one fill. Very happy with this steamer!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this steamer. Heats up fast and easy to use. I love not having to get the ironing board out:) Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my daughter and she said that it works great and her mother needs one. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does a good job of providing stream!
reviews.reviewText: I used this as a means to help remove the 3m shield on front of my RV. It made the job so much easier!!
